files.description: Defines a single deterministic policy (seed setting across common RNGs and canonical JSON serialization with stable key ordering and float formatting) used by both runner and comparator.
Implements benchmark execution using the shared deterministic policy to ensure repeated runs produce byte-identical canonical JSON outputs.
Implements benchmark result comparison using the same canonicalization rules (and optional numeric tolerance) so comparisons are stable and reproducible.
Pytest that runs the same benchmark twice and asserts results are byte-identical (or tolerance-identical) under the deterministic policy.

missionDescription: Define a single deterministic policy (seed handling + float formatting + JSON key ordering) and implement it in the runner and comparator; add a pytest that runs the same benchmark twice and asserts byte-identical (or tolerance-identical) results.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
